txt_en: Time renews itself, so can we.
Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
txt_cn: 生活之痛不可避，但可赋其意义。

txt_en: Walk forward, even if you crawl.
Don't tell me the moon is shining, show me the glint of light on broken glass.
txt_cn: 莫说月明，示我碎玻璃上的光。

txt_en: Not all who wander are lost.
txt_cn: 并非所有流浪者都迷失方向。

txt_en: What's coming is better than what's gone.
My love of the wild, no less than my love and kindness.
txt_cn: 我之爱野性，不下于我之爱善良。

txt_en: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
txt_cn: 泛爱众人，慎信于人，无负于人。

txt_en: Living beyond death, living after death.
txt_cn: 生命超越死亡，虽死犹生。

txt_en: You ain't ever gonna burn my heart out.
txt_cn: 你永远无法让我燃烧的心熄灭。

txt_en: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.
txt_cn: 不管别人怎么说，言语和思想足以改变世界。

txt_en: Love is always love, even in madness.
txt_cn: 爱始终是爱，哪怕在疯狂之中。

txt_en: If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there.
txt_cn: 如果你不知去向，那么随便一条路都能带你到达。
